help.title: Help & documentation
help.subtitle: Offline-first guidance for safe gear lists.

sections.title: Follow the dashboard flow
sections.description: Dashboard → select or create a project → edit the gear list.
items: Create a project first so autosave can protect every edit.
The dashboard keeps each production separate and easy to reopen.
Open the project tab to update details, categories, and items.

sections.title: Edit the project safely
sections.description: Projects stay local and keep notes with every export and backup.
items: Add categories, then list items with quantity, unit, and status.
Project notes are included in exports for crew instructions and pickup details.
Autosave keeps redundant copies after every change.

sections.title: Templates and exports
sections.description: Templates live in the Templates tab. Exports and backups live in the Project view.
items: Save the active project as a template whenever you repeat a kit.
Apply templates to add gear without overwriting existing lists.
Use the Project top bar and Save, share, restore panel for PDF export, backups, and sharing.

offline.title: Offline workflow
offline.description: Every feature works without a connection.
steps: Open the dashboard and select or create a project while offline.
Use “Save now” before handing off or closing the device.
Download a backup file for transfer or long-term storage.
Import a backup file on another device to merge gear lists safely.
Use “Restore from device backup” if local storage needs recovery.
offline.footer: Backups stay on-device unless you export or share them.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Key safety behaviors are automatic, with manual controls when you need them.

sections.title: Saving and autosave
sections.description: Autosave starts as soon as a project is created or opened.
items: Every change is saved locally and mirrored to redundant backups.
“Save now” forces an immediate sync across local storage locations.
Status updates confirm when saves and repairs are complete.

sections.title: Sharing, exports, and templates
sections.description: Exports and templates stay inside the app and remain offline-first.
items: Use the Project top bar to export a PDF of the active gear list.
Templates are managed in the Templates tab and can be applied to any project.
Clipboard sharing copies a full backup for quick handoffs.

sections.title: Backup and restore
sections.description: Multiple backups protect your data on the same device.
items: Download backup files for long-term storage or device migration.
Import backups to merge rather than overwrite your current data.
Restore from device backup if storage needs recovery.
